title: Antigravity vs ClearML: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs ClearML. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and ClearML? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs ClearML
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2025 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

ClearML (llm ops) is ClearML is an open-source, end-to-end MLOps platform designed to streamline the entire machine learning lifecycle. It provides a unified suite for experiment tracking, orchestration of training pipelines, dataset versioning, model registry, and production deployment. Its key differentiator is its 'auto-magical' integration that automatically logs experiments, code, and artifacts with minimal code changes, making it highly popular with data scientists and ML engineers for its ease of adoption and powerful automation.. Users choose it for mlops, experiment-tracking, pipeline-orchestration.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code

ClearML: Automated experiment tracking (metrics, hyperparams, code, console output, artifacts), Orchestration of multi-step ML pipelines (ClearML Pipelines) with dependency management, Versioned dataset management (ClearML Data) for traceable data lineage

verdict: Both Antigravity and ClearML are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, ClearML for mlops.
